report.name: 仓库当天作业量统计
report.sql: select d.docno docno, d.operatetype_id opType from GV_LOG_DOCUMENT_LOG d, gv_sys_codeinfo dt where d.doctype_id = dt.id and dt.code in ('SO', 'PK') and d.warehouse_id = ? and d.createdtime >= trunc(sysdate) order by d.createdtime asc
select count(*) total from gv_sales_order_header h where h.wh_id = ? and h.createdtime >= trunc(sysdate) and h.status_id <> 560
